title: The impact of pH and temperature on the green gold nanoparticles preparation using Jeju Hallabong peel extract for biomedical applications
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,14582-14592
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00614C, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ridhola Tri Ariski, Kyung Kwan Lee, Yongkwan Kim, Chang-Soo Lee
Promising AuNPs were synthesized through reduction of gold chloride salt (Au3+) to gold nanoparticles (Au0) is carried out by phenolic compound as a reduction agent and flavonoid molecules as stabilizing agents by utilizing Jeju Hallabong peel extract.
